## PopulatableGivety.liquidate() method

Liquidate one or more undercollateralized Troves.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
liquidate(address: string | string[]): Promise<PopulatedGivetyTransaction<P, SentGivetyTransaction<S, GivetyReceipt<R, LiquidationDetails>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string \| string\[\] | Address or array of addresses whose Troves to liquidate. |
